original_title: The Wave by The FIRM: Speed Slimming Sculpt
overview: Speed Slimming Sculpt is The FIRM's most targeted, super sculpting workout that gives you the trim, toned and tight body you've always wanted. Allie focuses on strengthinh major muscle groups by using the WAVE as a dynamic rocking tool for maximum muscle toning and high calorie burn.
title: The Wave by The FIRM: Speed Slimming Sculpt
